resources.string: add and delete files on device\'s internal storage
used to provide services such as latitude and longitude

During usage, in order to provide you with more features, we may apply for Root/Su permission from you. You can go to Permission Management at any time to adjust the authorization status of all permissions, and please go to your Root/Su manager to grant Root/Su permissions.

Welcome to HyperCeiler! This app relies on the Xposed framework to run. You can use this app to hijack and modify other supported apps to enhance the system. During usage, in order to provide you with more functions, we may apply for Root/Su permissions from you. You can manage it at any time by going to your Root/Su Manager.
Enter a value for the key
Removing key failed, may not exist:
Please check the return value type that requires obtaining the key!

Enter *#*#65686633#*#* on the dialer interface to enable support for N5/N8 bands. If it shows \"enable N5 and N8 mode\", the feature will be successfully activated.

Reduces CPU load, but breaks input-related features, such as three-finger screenshots.

Automatic recovery of tampered content is prohibited. When the Disable digest verify function is turned on, it will be enabled by default. Only supports Android 13 and above.

This feature is extremely dangerous and should only be enabled when absolutely necessary

Notes before using:
• After turning on this feature, check and restart the System UI and the corresponding music scope.
• This feature needs to be used with the "Lyric Getter" module.
• Ensure that the "Focus notification lyrics" notification is enabled in the notification category of the corresponding music app and in the app's focus notifications settings.
Hide the status bar clock when showing focused lyrics, and adjust the animation of the dropdown Notification shade.
Click the focus lyrics event to change the status bar clock to display, otherwise hide it. The switch needs to restart the corresponding music software to take effect.
Add whitespace at the end of lyrics
Make scrolling lyrics as complete as possible
Disables all audio output. Experimental features that may contain erratic content

The completion functions are as follows:
• The device can be synchronized with Mi Creation.
• The domestic and international versions of Mi Browser can be synchronized simultaneously.

Note: The first synchronization of Mi Creation must be enabled from the settings of Mi Creation, otherwise it will prompt that the network is unavailable or the system is busy, please try again later.

App has no default launchable activity
Are you sure you want to disable the app?
If this is a necessary system app, disabling it could cause damage.

Note: Modifying this setting only hides the visibility of the feature on the homepage, and features that have been turned on won\'t be turned off!\nHiding the feature on the homepage will take effect immediately, and the app will need to be restarted to reappear.
Can\'t find the app features on the homepage?

To maintain the simplicity and usability of the homepage, we have hidden access to the following types of app features:

 • Those currently disabled or hidden
 • Those not found in your device
 • Those incompatible with the current version of the system or the app
 • Not selected as scoped

Please troubleshoot based on the above information, restart HyperCeiler, and try again. If you still can't find the app features, it may be a bug. Please provide timely and effective feedback to us.

Currently hidden app features:

To maintain the simplicity and usability of the homepage, we have hidden access to the following types of app features:

 • Those currently disabled or hidden
 • Those not found in your device
 • Those incompatible with the current version of the system or the app
 • Not selected as scoped

Please troubleshoot based on the above information, restart HyperCeiler, and try again. If you still can't find the app features, it may be a bug. Please provide timely and effective feedback to us.

There are currently no hidden features!
You can still find this page in About > Help. Reboot app to apply.
Current app version support system version list
The current app version is fully adapted to the following system versions:
The following system versions are adapted to the current app version:
The current system version is fully adapted.
The current system version isn\'t (fully) adapted.
The source of the ROM you are using may not be an official Xiaomi ROM, and some features may not work. Please contact your supplier for more details.
The current device is running on a system version that isn\'t (fully) adapted, which may result in anomalies in the HyperCeiler functionality.
The signature verification failed, and the current version you are using may not be from the official version of HyperCeiler, and may contain malicious code.

Auto safe mode can unhook some apps in time when they crash multiple times to ensure safety. This feature requires the hook scope \"System Framework\" to run, and we strongly recommend that you check the scope \"System Framework\" to activate Auto safe mode.
You can select text after long or double press, or copy it and send it back to the developer.
Today in history: Sevtinge delivered an important speech on July 14, 2022.
The current device log service is abnormal and HyperCeiler features will be limited. Please restore the log service so that it can run normally.\nError code: %1$s
The current device log service is abnormal and HyperCeiler features will be limited. Please restore the log service so that it can run normally.
%1$s has entered Safe mode due to multiple crashes, and HyperCeiler features has been temporarily disabled.
%1$s is still in Safe mode and HyperCeiler features has been disabled. Disable Safe mode?
Tip: Here is the default tip. If you can see me, it means that there is a problem with HyperCeiler. Please report it to the developer in a timely and effective manner.
Today is HyperCeiler\'s birthday!\nThank you for your support over the past year, and let\'s continue to work together this year!
Allow call forwarding via MMI code
Allows direct dialing of MMI codes, such as **21*8#, to activate call forwarding.
Allow recording of the Wake with voice without internet
Allows the recording of words from the Wake with voice when offline
Set accuracy for Wake with voice detection
Higher values are more difficult to detect. The default value is 70%, for the keyword XATX it\'s 0%. After setting, you need to restart the target app and re-enroll your activation word.
Make sure you\'ve entered the IMEI correctly. An incorrect IMEI may cause the eSIM to be unavailable or abnormal. We\'re not responsible for any consequences arising therefrom.
Force Immersive sound on after disconnecting headphones
